name: An Exotic Attraction In Sumatera " Pacu Jawi " ( Bull Race )
description: This is a villages game, that already exist since ancient people, and this attraction you can find in this area only , not in other area.Every farmers usually comes from different villages in this region, and gathering , take a part in this attraction, its held after harvest and before plantation, so that why the area always moving if the farmer of the rice field need to do plantation, and they need to find new area which suitable for the race arena and mostly only local people knows about the arena.
